photo.description: Mini Tour is a Flash XML Template featuring beautiful motion transition effects.
Black Pad is a fluid layout XML flash website that is 100% width and height with minimum values defined by SWFfit.
Clean Gallery is a fluid layout Flash website featuring drag to slide thumbnails and a horizontal scrollbar.
Mega Grid is a free flash image gallery enabling touch to drag thumbnails and scroll them horizontally.
Content Grid is a very flexible display gallery using touch to slide items horizontally and re-position items upon browser resize.
Bubble Template is a beautiful bubbles-animated website that supports resizing browser and fullscreen.
Neon Template is a free Flash XML website integrated with HTML-CSS supported vertical content list.
Single Cord is new Flash XML Template with an attractive background and accordion slider for page transitions.
Dark Focus is decorated with black and white photos in simple fade in out transition.
Fluid Gallery is a free image gallery that can be either 100% fluid or fixed width and height. Configure XML variables to customize the gallery.
